levels.label: Intern
levels.description: Student or recent graduate gaining experience

levels.label: Mid-level
levels.description: Experienced professional with solid technical skills

levels.label: Senior
levels.description: Highly experienced with advanced technical and leadership skills

levels.label: Lead
levels.description: Technical leader responsible for team guidance and architecture

levels.label: Principal
levels.description: Senior technical expert with organization-wide impact

levels.label: Staff
levels.description: Senior technical contributor with broad impact across teams

levels.label: Distinguished
levels.description: Top-tier technical expert with industry-wide recognition
